articles.content:
India has a target of 60,000 MW of wind power by 2022. Photo: PlaneMad/Wikimedia Commons

articles.description: In the last ten days, petrol price has gone up by Rs. 1.28 per litre and diesel rate has increased by Rs. 1.96 in Delhi.

articles.title: Tax officials to persuade 25,000 entities to file monthly GST returns by Monday - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Tax officers have been directed to follow up personally with these defaulting taxpayers so that their GSTR-3B returns due for the month get filed by November 30, 2020, officials said.

articles.title: ‘Can’t Drive For Over 12 Hours’: Road Transport Ministry Issues New Guidelines For Ola, Uber Drivers - Swarajya
articles.description: The ridesharing companies will have to ensure that their drivers attain at least 10 hours of rest in the day.
articles.content:
The road transport ministry has issued new guidelines that prohibit any driver employed with ridesharing companies like Ola and Uber to drive their vehicles for more than 12 hours a day.
